ModifyDiagDBInstanceConf.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: dbbrain.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDiagDBInstanceConf
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Product": "redis",
    "Regions": "All",
    "InstanceIds": [
        "crs-pz1raq11"
    ],
    "InstanceConfs": {
        "AnalysisTopKey": "Yes",
        "KeyDelimiters": [
            ",",
            ";",
            ":",
            "_",
            "+",
            "@",
            "=",
            "|",
            "#",
            "."
        ]
    }
}
ModifyDiagDBInstanceConf.title: 修改Redis实例大key周期性分析

POST / HTTP/1.1

Content-Type: application/json

<公共请求参数>

{
    "ProfileType": "RedisAutoScaleUp",
    "InstanceId": "crs-1p8z8saa",
    "Product": "redis",
    "NewProfileInfo": "\t{\n    \"MemoryUpperLimit\": 512,\n    \"Version\": 0,\n    \"Enabled\": true,\n    \"Uin\": \"100013717858\",\n    \"ThresholdRule\": {\n        \"Duration\": 900,\n        \"Metric\": \"mem_util\",\n        \"Threshold\": 50\n    }\n}"
}
